Key Match Events: Jameson Taillon outdueled Gerrit Cole in a well-pitched, 2-1 Chicago Cubs victory over the New York Yankees.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The two faced off on the mound for the first time.
Sunday marked Gerrit Cole's 34th birthday, and Jameson Taillon and Cole's wife surprised him with a boat trip on Lake Michigan and a nice dinner at an upscale restaurant.
Others: Jameson Taillon was drafted second overall by the Pittsburgh Pirates in 2010, a year before they selected Gerrit Cole with the No. 1 pick.
